nrqlQueries.query: FROM Metric SELECT latest(device_name) AS 'Device Name', latest(src_addr) AS 'Device IP', latest(kentik.snmp.Uptime)/8640000 AS 'Uptime (Days)', latest(SysObjectID) AS 'SysObjectID', latest(entity.type) AS 'Entity Type', latest(instrumentation.name) AS 'Ktranslate Profile', latest(timestamp) AS 'Last Update', latest(PollingHealth) AS 'Polling Health', latest(PollingHealthReason) AS 'Last Health Problem', filter(latest(timestamp), where PollingHealth = 'BAD') AS 'Last Health Problem Timestamp'  WHERE instrumentation.name = 'aruba-clearpass'
FROM Metric SELECT latest(kentik.snmp.CPU) AS 'Current CPU Utilization %' WHERE instrumentation.name = 'aruba-clearpass'

FROM Metric SELECT (latest(kentik.snmp.cppmSystemMemoryTotal) - latest(kentik.snmp.cppmSystemMemoryFree)) * 100 / latest(kentik.snmp.cppmSystemMemoryTotal) AS 'Current Memory Utilization %' WHERE instrumentation.name = 'aruba-clearpass'

FROM Metric SELECT (latest(kentik.snmp.cppmSystemDiskSpaceTotal) - latest(kentik.snmp.cppmSystemDiskSpaceFree)) * 100 / latest(kentik.snmp.cppmSystemDiskSpaceTotal) AS 'Current Disk Utilization %' WHERE instrumentation.name = 'aruba-clearpass'
FROM Metric SELECT min(kentik.snmp.CPU) AS 'Min CPU', max(kentik.snmp.CPU) AS 'Max CPU', average(kentik.snmp.CPU) AS 'Average CPU' TIMESERIES 5 MINUTES WHERE instrumentation.name = 'aruba-clearpass'

FROM Metric SELECT (min(kentik.snmp.cppmSystemMemoryTotal) - min(kentik.snmp.cppmSystemMemoryFree)) * 100 / min(kentik.snmp.cppmSystemMemoryTotal) AS 'Min Memory', (max(kentik.snmp.cppmSystemMemoryTotal) - max(kentik.snmp.cppmSystemMemoryFree)) * 100 / max(kentik.snmp.cppmSystemMemoryTotal) AS 'Max Memory', (average(kentik.snmp.cppmSystemMemoryTotal) - average(kentik.snmp.cppmSystemMemoryFree)) * 100 / average(kentik.snmp.cppmSystemMemoryTotal) AS 'Average Memory' TIMESERIES 5 MINUTES  WHERE instrumentation.name = 'aruba-clearpass'

FROM Metric SELECT (max(kentik.snmp.cppmSystemDiskSpaceTotal) - max(kentik.snmp.cppmSystemDiskSpaceFree)) * 100 / max(kentik.snmp.cppmSystemDiskSpaceTotal) AS 'Max Disk Usage' TIMESERIES 5 MINUTES  WHERE instrumentation.name = 'aruba-clearpass'

FROM Metric SELECT 
latest(kentik.snmp.radAuthCounterSuccess) AS 'radAuthCounterSuccess'
, latest(kentik.snmp.radAuthCounterFailure) AS 'radAuthCounterFailure'
, latest(kentik.snmp.radAuthCounterCount) AS 'radAuthCounterCount'
, latest(kentik.snmp.radAuthCounterTime) AS 'radAuthCounterTime'
 WHERE instrumentation.name = 'aruba-clearpass'  
FACET radAuthSourceName 
LIMIT MAX

FROM Metric SELECT 
latest(cppmSystemVersion) AS 'cppmSystemVersion'
, latest(cppmClusterNodeType) AS 'cppmClusterNodeType'
, latest(cppmZoneName) AS 'cppmZoneName'
, latest(cppmNumClusterNodes) AS 'cppmNumClusterNodes'
, latest(cppmNwMgmtPortIPAddress) AS 'cppmNwMgmtPortIPAddress'
, latest(cppmNwMgmtPortMACAddress) AS 'cppmNwMgmtPortMACAddress'
, latest(cppmNwDataPortIPAddress) AS 'cppmNwDataPortIPAddress'
, latest(cppmNwDataPortMACAddress) AS 'cppmNwDataPortMACAddress'
, latest(cppmSystemNumCPUs) AS 'cppmSystemNumCPUs' 
WHERE instrumentation.name = 'aruba-clearpass'

FROM Metric SELECT 
latest(kentik.snmp.psAutzCounterSuccess) AS 'psAutzCounterSuccess'
, latest(kentik.snmp.psAutzCounterFailure) AS 'psAutzCounterFailure'
, latest(kentik.snmp.psAutzCounterCount) AS 'psAutzCounterCount'
, latest(kentik.snmp.psAutzCounterTime) AS 'psAutzCounterTime' 
WHERE instrumentation.name = 'aruba-clearpass'  
FACET psAutzSourceName 
LIMIT MAX

FROM Metric SELECT latest(kentik.snmp.radPolicyEvalTime) AS 'radPolicyEvalTime', latest(kentik.snmp.radAuthRequestTime) AS 'radAuthRequestTime', latest(kentik.snmp.radServerCounterSuccess) AS 'radServerCounterSuccess', latest(kentik.snmp.radServerCounterFailure) AS 'radServerCounterFailure', latest(kentik.snmp.radServerCounterCount) AS 'radServerCounterCount' WHERE instrumentation.name = 'aruba-clearpass'  Facet Index 
LIMIT MAX

FROM Metric SELECT latest(kentik.snmp.psServicePolicyEvalCount) AS 'psServicePolicyEvalCount', latest(kentik.snmp.psRolemappingPolicyEvalCount) AS 'psRolemappingPolicyEvalCount', latest(kentik.snmp.psPosturePolicyEvalCount) AS 'psPosturePolicyEvalCount', latest(kentik.snmp.psAuditPolicyEvalCount) AS 'psAuditPolicyEvalCount', latest(kentik.snmp.psRestrictionPolicyEvalCount) AS 'psRestrictionPolicyEvalCount', latest(kentik.snmp.psEnforcementPolicyEvalCount) AS 'psEnforcementPolicyEvalCount', latest(kentik.snmp.psServicePolicyEvalTime) AS 'psServicePolicyEvalTime', latest(kentik.snmp.psRolemappingPolicyEvalTime) AS 'psRolemappingPolicyEvalTime', latest(kentik.snmp.psPosturePolicyEvalTime) AS 'psPosturePolicyEvalTime', latest(kentik.snmp.psAuditPolicyEvalTime) AS 'psAuditPolicyEvalTime', latest(kentik.snmp.psRestrictionPolicyEvalTime) AS 'psRestrictionPolicyEvalTime', latest(kentik.snmp.psEnforcementPolicyEvalTime) AS 'psEnforcementPolicyEvalTime', latest(kentik.snmp.psSessionlogTime) AS 'psSessionlogTime', latest(kentik.snmp.psAuthCounterSuccess) AS 'psAuthCounterSuccess', latest(kentik.snmp.psAuthCounterFailure) AS 'psAuthCounterFailure', latest(kentik.snmp.psAuthCounterTotal) AS 'psAuthCounterTotal', latest(kentik.snmp.dailySuccessAuthCount) AS 'dailySuccessAuthCount', latest(kentik.snmp.dailyFailedAuthCount) AS 'dailyFailedAuthCount', latest(kentik.snmp.dailyTotalAuthCount) AS 'dailyTotalAuthCount' WHERE instrumentation.name = 'aruba-clearpass'  Facet Index 
LIMIT MAX

FROM Metric SELECT 
latest(kentik.snmp.tacAuthCounterSuccess) AS 'tacAuthCounterSuccess'
, latest(kentik.snmp.tacAuthCounterFailure) AS 'tacAuthCounterFailure'
, latest(kentik.snmp.tacAuthCounterCount) AS 'tacAuthCounterCount'
, latest(kentik.snmp.tacAuthCounterTime) AS 'tacAuthCounterTime'
, latest(kentik.snmp.tacAuthCounterAuthTime) AS 'tacAuthCounterAuthTime'
, latest(kentik.snmp.tacServicePolicyEvalTime) AS 'tacServicePolicyEvalTime'
, latest(kentik.snmp.tacPolicyEvalTime) AS 'tacPolicyEvalTime' 
WHERE instrumentation.name = 'aruba-clearpass'   Facet Index

FROM Metric SELECT 
latest(kentik.snmp.tacAutzCounterSuccess) AS 'tacAutzCounterSuccess'
, latest(kentik.snmp.tacAutzCounterFailure) AS 'tacAutzCounterFailure'
, latest(kentik.snmp.tacAutzCounterCount) AS 'tacAutzCounterCount'
, latest(kentik.snmp.tacAutzCounterTime) AS 'tacAutzCounterTime' 
WHERE instrumentation.name = 'aruba-clearpass'  
LIMIT MAX

FROM Metric SELECT 
latest(kentik.snmp.nwTrafficTotal) AS 'nwTrafficTotal'
, latest(kentik.snmp.nwAppPort) AS 'nwAppPort'
WHERE instrumentation.name = 'aruba-clearpass' 
FACET nwAppName
LIMIT MAX
